SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The class Game represents an object Game that permits to keep tracking and updating the model through a series of methods and a listener linked to the class itself, GameListener.

It permits to establish the number of players, the active Player and a series of interactions that may occur with the Board. It is also necessary to register, access and modify the current state of the game.

See Also:
  • Game
  • GameListener
  • WebSocket.Listener

  • Board

    • createGameFileIfNotExist

      public void createGameFileIfNotExist(String gamesPath)
      Create a new game file if it not exists, saving the current model
      Parameters:

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String gamesStoragePath, String gamesStoragePathBackup)
      Method used to save the current state of the Game. The state is stored in a json file. BY saving it, it is possible to restore the state of the game to a certain moment avoiding the risk of losing information about the score of a Player in case of disconnection.
      Parameters:
      gamesStoragePath - path in which games are stored
      gamesStoragePathBackup - backup path in which games are stored
      See Also:
      • Game
      • Player
